description: This source file defines a React functional component named LiveSearch, which provides a debounced search input for querying a backend service for various resource types related to integrations like Jira or Confluence. It handles user input, calls the search API, normalizes results, manages loading/error states, and renders search results along with pagination controls.

methods.name: isRecord
methods.description: Type guard function to check if a value is a Record<string, unknown>.

methods.name: toArray
methods.description: Converts a value to an array of type T; if the value is already an array, returns it; if null or undefined, returns an empty array.

methods.name: asString
methods.description: Converts a value to a string if possible; returns undefined otherwise.

methods.name: normalizeResults
methods.description: Processes raw search result data (array or object with results/items) into an array of normalized result objects containing id, title, url, type, status, project, space, and summary.
